summary: A configuration holder for DETR models that specifies backbone choice, transformer architecture (dimensions, layers, attention heads), dropout settings, initialization schemes, and loss weighting parameters for object detection and panoptic segmentation, enabling reproducible model creation.
business_intent: Allow developers to easily configure and instantiate DETR models with custom backbones, hyperparameters, and loss coefficients, supporting both pretrained and randomly initialized setups for computerâ€‘vision detection and segmentation applications.
